title: Interpretation of a job in a dream – seeing a job, getting a job in a dream

preview.html: To find a job in a dream, a job in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a job in a dream, interpretation of work in a dream This dream does not bode well for success, because it indicates a decline in work cycles and loss of work for wage earners. It also indicates a physical illness. If you dream that you are unemployed Work, it means that you will not be afraid of anything, because you are always in demand because of your conscious professional achievements that make you the necessary help. As for giving work to others, it is to lose it for yourself. All dreams that resemble this can be interpreted as mentioned above. Interpretation of searching for a sweet girl in a dreamIf you dream that you are searching About a new job, it means that you are looking for happiness in a new place, especially on the professional level, and therefore this dream is interpreted as finding a new opportunity with the help of a friend or becoming a business owner and your problems will end. If you are single, this dream indicates that you will find love New will end the marriage. If you are married, you are likely to get pregnant soon. The most important thing to know is that dreaming about a job means goodness and getting rid of financial problems. Interpretation of starting a new job in a dream. This dream indicates that you will meet a good person and you will feel happy with him. It can also mean that you will find a really new job and it will be better than the one you have at the moment, which means That your career is constantly developing and many positive changes will occur in it. Interpretation of a work contract in a dream for a single woman: Getting the best job in these times has become difficult, so women are always trying to search for a better job opportunity, so if you are single and dream of a new work contract, this expresses About your ambition and hope for the future, and these dreams often come true with a suitable job opportunity. If you dream of a work contract and do not sign it, this means that you are in a state of waiting and waiting and are trying to study this opportunity in order to choose the right decision. If you dream that you signed it, this means that you are about to achieve your future goals. Interpretation of an employment contract in a dream for a married woman. If you are married and dream of an employment contract, this indicates an improvement in your living situation, so that you renew your desire to persevere in developing your position, and this may mean that you will obtain A desired promotion or salary increase. But if you are married and do not work, dreaming of a job contract means that you will receive good news, especially on the financial front, or you will hear the news of the marriage of the couple you love, and it may also mean that your husband will give you a gift that you love. Interpretation of the dream of getting a job In a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream. There is a lot of research. Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream. Since it is one of the strange visions that a person sees, seeing the number 150 is rare and there are many different signs that symbolize positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The site explains. They differ in interpretation. Seeing the number 150 in a dreamAs the famous Arab translator Ibn Sirin explains in his book on the interpretation of dreams as follows: Ibn Sirin says that seeing multiples of the number 5 is a sign of stability and achieving the highest degree of balance in the dreamer’s life, because it provides rights to everyone. Whoever sees the number 150 in his dream This is evidence of psychological comfort and reassurance, and it also indicates the end of the periods of physical, psychological and spiritual problems that he suffers from. This vision is good news for the dreamer who does not lose hope in God’s mercy and forgiveness. If a divorced woman sees the number 150 in her dream, this means that problems in her life It will end and you will reach the stage of calm. Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a single woman’s dream. Even numbers in a dream indicate confusion and hesitation in making a decision, given the importance of her decision in her life, so she needs to think realistically about the process of skipping orders and making the right decision. Seeing the number may indicate 150 in her dream refers to a beloved socialite who takes charge and indicates the beginning of a new relationship or her approval of her engagement by a man who has proposed to her. If the girl is engaged, and she sees this vision, it indicates the approaching date of her wedding, and it is said that the number indicates the number of days remaining until the wedding. If she sees the number 150 in her dream, this indicates the end of the discussions and arguments that exhaust her psychologically, and opinions must be expressed to get rid of the misunderstandings that caused problems and obstacles. If the girl is still studying and sees the number 150 written in the sky, this is an indication that her academic level has improved. Improve and she will take the exam next semester. Good news that she will pass this exam. Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees this number in her dream, this indicates her efforts to constantly change to change the routine of her marital life. This vision also indicates a balance between work and life Personality so that her preoccupation with work does not cause problems with her husband or neglect in raising her children. Interpretation of seeing the number 150 in a dream: For a married woman, this is considered a state of instability and she must take into account her priorities and focus on the basics of life in a positive way. It also indicates her efforts to succeed and all that she has to do. It is to keep fighting and finding ways to help. If she sees the number 150 written in her room in her dream, this indicates the need for change and self-confidence. If he is planning something but hesitates to start making a decision or not, then this vision is a message to start now. If She saw the number 150 in a dream, this is a sign that she will move to a new home and there will be many...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a bird cage in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you the interpretation of seeing a bird cage. It is famous for its iron and wooden bird cage. It is also used to plant birds for decoration. A cage in a dream is full, where birds are located, has many interpretations, and therefore we have collected our respected followers for you. I present to you what is the interpretation of a dream about a cage for healthy married and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of great scholars who interpret dreams and visions. If you are interested in knowing the interpretation, you should follow the article. Why does a cage dream by Ibn Sirin? The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book the complete interpretation of seeing a birdcage in a dream, as this is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will have new and better opportunities. Also, seeing a cage in a dream is complete It is a sign that the dreamer will accumulate wealth and food with a lot of money that will come without fatigue and hardship. Dreaming of bird eggs in a cage is a sign for the dreamer of a variety of supplies, kindness and benefits to be received. But the presence of predatory animals in a cage is an unwanted dream that portends accidents. And disasters for the dreamer.See also: Why dream of seeing a shrunken one in a dream completeWhy dream of a cage for big womenWhy dream of a bird cage for a bowling woman, shows the girl a feeling of mutual love between her and someone close to her, and this is a sign of joy.But seeing an empty bird cage in a dream that is complete is one of the visions Unpleasant and generally undesirable to interpret. Why dream of a bird in a cage in a dream, but it was just that – a good omen for her imminent marriage to a man who has a lot of money and status. A birdcage in a dream is a sign of happiness, joy and imminent marriage. This is a sign of hearing the news The Sarah. A cage in a lonely woman’s dream, and in it there are dead birds, testifies to sadness, imprisonment, and futility in her life. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a whole bulb in a dream? Why does a married woman dream of a cage? The interpretation of seeing a birdcage in a dream is complete and there are no birds in it, indicating its closeness to One house to another. Seeing one bird in a cage for a married woman is evidence of many problems between her and her husband in the coming period of her life. A dream book about birds for a married woman and hearing their voice is good news for her and an indication of joy and hearing good news. See also: Why dream of seeing a bird’s nest In a dream, completeWhy dream of a cage for a pregnant woman? Seeing a bird cage in a dream for a pregnant woman complete with birds and the shape of them all is good news and evidence of an easy and affordable birth and that she and her fetus are healthy. In addition, seeing one bird in a cage indicates that he is very tired Due to childbirth and pregnancy. The absence of birds and birds in the cage for a pregnant woman is an unwanted vision that indicates bad luck for her and her pregnancy. See also: Why does a parrot dream in a complete dream? If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.

title: Interpretation of dreams of people gathering in our house by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about people gathering in our house refers to many different interpretations and indicators that differ from one vision to another due to the various events that occur during the vision as well as the state in which the viewer is and the psychological problems or crises that he may suffer from in reality. The article will explain the most important interpretations shown in the vision in which people gather in our house. Interpretation of dreams about people gathering in our house. Seeing people gathering in our house means that we will hear some good news that will happen soon in the life of the fortuneteller. The person who sees in a dream that there are many people in the house And they feel upset, this is evidence that the dreamer will face a big problem soon. Seeing a number of people gathering inside the house means that you will hear some good news and get rid of all fears. People gathering in the house and crying indicates the loss of a loved one and feeling very sad. A lot of people gathered In the fortuneteller’s house, it indicates some problems that will arise soon between him and his family, and he should be careful. Seeing a lot of people gathering inside the house and singing shows that all the problems that the dreamer is suffering from will end and they will live in peace. People gathering in the house and feeling sad indicate that the dreamer will soon face Some material obstacles. Interpretation of dreams: people gathering in our house by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing people gathering in the house means that the dreamer will be relieved of all his worries. Seeing people gathering and singing in the house indicates the imminent marriage of someone close to God and a feeling of happiness. The person who sees in a dream A gathering of unknown people and a feeling of happiness indicates positive changes that will soon occur in the dreamer’s life. He explained that seeing people gathering at home and feeling fear indicates thoughts that are overwhelming the viewer and he does not know how to control them. Seeing people gathering and feeling upset means that the dreamer will face a big problem in the period Next.Interpretation of dreams of people gathering in our house for singles. Seeing people gathering in the house for singles means that you will get rid of all the fears that you are facing at the moment. Seeing people constantly gathering in a single-family house indicates that he will soon achieve all the goals he seeks. People gathering in the house for singles This is a sign that we will soon hear some happy news about her and feel happy. Seeing people gathering at home and feeling annoyed by single people indicates that there are some thoughts that are draining you and you do not know how to overcome them. If an unmarried woman sees that there is a strange woman, she invites a lot of People to meet in her house, this is evidence that she will face some problems in her field of work. Interpretation of dreams of male guests in our house for single peopleSeeing men as guests in an unmarried woman’s house indicates that she will get rid of some of the debts that she is currently suffering from. If an unmarried woman sees that there are guests Males in her house and she screamed, this is evidence that she will overcome all the difficulties she faces

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cow

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream, as the cow is one of our useful animals for those who benefit from its meat, milk, and skin. The cow is also one of the animals mentioned by God Almighty in the Holy Qur’an. The cow has many positive meanings that we will try to present to you. To some through this article about the most famous dream interpretation scholars, such as Muhammad Ibn Sirin and Imam Nabulsi, about an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, about different scenes of seeing a cow in a dream, such as bumping into a cow. The cow, to see a black and white cow in a dream or to see many cows, but it is important before we start giving Surah Al-Baqarah in a dream to emphasize that abandoning the interpretation that we will mention in any other is to see things that can create problems for the pregnant woman because abortion is wrong Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The researcher in the interpretation of dreams, Ibn Sirin, says that a cow in a dream in general is an indication that the dreamer is a religious person. In addition to seeing a cow in a dream, this indicates many good things - God willing - that the dreamer will enjoy. In life. In addition, Ibn Sirin says that cows in a dream can express the number of years, based on the vision of the King of Egypt in Surah Sayyidna Yusuf. Also, seeing a precious cow in a dream, this could be from humanity for the abundant good that It will support the general public in the coming period. As for a dry cow in a dream, it indicates the pain that people will go through in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a cow in a dream for Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Nabulsi says: The interpretation of a cow in a dream for someone who sees that he is milking a cow may be a bad sign of... The corruption of the wife, and God knows best. As for seeing the belly of a cow in a dream, this may be one of the praiseworthy signs that indicate money, abundance of sustenance, and benefits that will blind - God willing - the dreamer. Seeing a cow in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a cow in a dream may This is a sign that she will get married - God willing - in the near future. Just like the unmarried girl who sees a beautiful cow in her dream, she is from the human race who will marry - God willing - one of the personalities blessed with justice. As for the single girl who sees a weak cow In a dream, this may indicate that girl’s bad luck in marriage, in addition to the white cow in a single girl’s dream, which may indicate a relationship with a good person. Seeing a cow in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees a cow in a dream, this is human for her in The happy married life that she lived. In addition to the fact that a married woman sees a fat cow in a dream, this indicates the year that will pass for the woman and which will be filled with goodness - God willing. In addition to the fact that a married woman sees a crazy woman in a dream, this could indicate pregnancy or the expectation of taste - God willing. God. Seeing a cow in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees a cow in a dream means that she...

title: Interpretation of a dream about water in the house

preview.html: Also, too much water can lead to death, and many may see that seeing water inside the house creates confusion in the soul about its interpretation, and from here we mention the interpretations related to seeing water in the house. Interpretation of a dream about water in the house for unmarried women: An unmarried girl who sees water in the house indicates The house indicates that she will feel comfortable and at peace. May God compensate her for what she went through in the past, God willing. When the girl saw water in the house in her dream, she was young and had some problems in her studies. Seeing water indicates her success in the next semester in her studies and that it will be a reason In making her family happy, God willing. In the event that an unmarried girl exceeds the age of marriage, which causes her to go through a difficult psychological state and she sees water in the house. This indicates that God Almighty will give her a good husband in the coming days. And God will compensate him for her financial and psychological crises, God willing. When An unmarried girl sees cloudy water at home, this indicates that she will be exposed to some worries and anxieties in the coming period. Whether she is engaged, this may indicate that this person is not suitable for her and does not suit her. Seeing turbid water in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates behavior Bad for that girl. This is also the reason why no one proposes to her due to her bad morals. But she must repent to God Almighty and turn to Him, for He alone is able to guide her, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that water has completely covered her room. This indicates She is immersed in disobedience and sins, and this is the reason for the reluctance of young girls to accompany her. She must turn to God Almighty, so that He may repent for her and guide her to the paths of guidance, God Almighty willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream about water in the house for a married woman when A married woman sees water in a dream, this is a good omen for her. If she is delayed in having children, this indicates that God Almighty will carry her in the coming period, God willing. Seeing water in a married woman’s dream may mean that she will hear good news, perhaps from someone close to her. Or Whoever died with her, and God knows best. Either in the case of seeing water in a married woman’s dream that satisfies the onlookers. This is a good vision that shows that God will provide her husband with a lot of money and good sustenance without effort. Which will be a reason for her life to change for the better than before, God willing. When a woman sees A married woman dreams that her house has some water leaks, which causes anxiety, distress, and distress. This indicates that this woman has committed some serious mistakes against her husband, and God knows best. It could cause difficult disputes that cannot be resolved. But God Almighty is able to distract them from their worries, and inspire them. By apologizing for what she caused against her husband. And it makes righteous people a source of increased disagreements between them, God willing. When a married woman sees that she is pouring water in large quantities, this indicates an exaggeration in many matters of life. She is unable to manage the affairs of the home and must be concerned with learning how to manage the affairs of the home. Her home and to take care of her

This indicates that God Almighty will give her a good husband in the coming days. And God will compensate him for her financial and psychological crises, God willing. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing fog in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing fog in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about fog for a man and a woman. Dreaming about fog has many interpretations. As we know that fog is a natural phenomenon that occurs in the sky, especially with clouds, as they fall and approach the ground. They are water droplets resulting from the condensation of steam near the ground. Fog can hinder the vision of cars and also cause some problems at sea. Ships and boats could not move, as sometimes visibility is poor. Meteorologists advise during this period not to walk on the roads and prevent maritime navigation to avoid any wrecks that may happen to ships, and thus seeing fog in a dream around it. Many questions that we will learn from during our article. Interpretation of a dream about fog by Ibn Sirin Fog in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explains, is evidence of rebellion and murder. Fog in a dream indicates hidden things and secrets that insight did not know. Fog in a dream also indicates anxiety and fear. Seeing a lot of Fog in a dream means deception. Fog in a dream indicates the wrong path. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a single woman. Fog in a dream for a single girl is an indication of a scandal that she will soon face, but she will be able to prove her innocence in front of family and relatives. If a girl sees in a dream fog strongly covering the sky, This is evidence that she is one of the most common people in her life. If a girl cannot see well in a dream because of fog, this indicates that she is unable to uncover the truth of what is happening around her. Seeing a girl in a dream, the fog disappears in front of her. This indicates a bright future and the happiness that you will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a married woman. Fog in a married woman’s dream is evidence of some psychological pressures and marital problems that she is suffering from. Seeing a lot of fog in the house suggests that this woman is unable to realize the reality of some of the things that are happening in Her home. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a pregnant woman. Fog in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the anxiety she feels about childbirth. Fog in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that she has overcome all the difficulties of childbirth and it will be easy. Interpretation of a dream about fog for a manIf a man sees fog in a dream in which he is concentrated, This indicates the need to avoid trouble, and he must fear God in what he does. For men, fog indicates the difficulties and obstacles he faces in his life. Seeing black fog in a man’s dream is evidence of interference from people in his life. Interpretation of seeing black fog Seeing black fog in The dream is evidence that there are people in the dreamer’s life who are working to deceive him, mislead him, expose him to harm, and make him cry because of them. Seeing black fog in a dream is evidence of negative thoughts controlling the dreamer and an inability to analyze things correctly. Interpretation of a dream about fog and rain: Seeing a mixture of fog and rain in a dream is evidence However, the dreamer loses many of the opportunities that life provides him due to his recklessness and lack of thinking. The interpretation of a dream about seeing fog with rain in a dream is evidence that the dreamer listens to strangers more than he listens to others.

title: Interpretation of a dream about being beaten inside the mosque in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of being beaten inside the mosque in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of the dream of being beaten inside the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of being beaten inside the mosque in a dream. Being beaten during prayer inside the mosque in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to a major problem that he will face at that time in the event that the person sees that Being beaten inside the mosque, this may indicate a crisis that the dreamer may be suffering from at that time. In the event that one sees that he is being beaten while praying inside the mosque, this may indicate a problem that the dreamer faces during this time. Seeing beatings inside the mosque in a dream may It indicates a financial crisis that the dreamer may face at this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he was hitting his shoes could indicate the presence of a large number of rumors that It revolves around him and that he must seek help from God. If one sees hitting with shoes in a dream, this may indicate that there are bad people in the dreamer’s life and he must rely on God. When one sees that he was hitting his shoes, this may be an indication of the psychological state that he is suffering from. The dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting dirt in a dream. Hitting the ground with dirt in a dream may indicate the material gains that the dreamer will achieve during these days. If you see dirt in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will travel soon. A dream about being exposed to dust may indicate new events. He spoke to the dreamer in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on the ground, this may indicate successful projects and great profits that the dreamer will achieve in those days, and God knows best. Seeing a brother hitting his sister in a dream may indicate good changes in her life during this time. When a person sees that he is hitting his sister in a dream, this may indicate great material gains that families will gain during this period. It is possible that seeing a brother hitting his sister in a dream His sister in a dream indicates some happy events that will come during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting one’s head against a wall in a dream. Hitting one’s head hard against a wall in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from a serious crisis during this time and needs to ask God for help. A dream about hitting one’s head Hitting a wall may indicate some diseases that the dreamer may be suffering from at that time, and God knows best. In the event that a person dreams of hitting his head against a wall, this may indicate that he is moving away from God, Blessed and Most High, and he must repent and return to God Almighty. In the case of a dream of hitting One's head against the wall, the dream may indicate the worries that the dreamer is dealing with at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of an infant: If the dreamer sees a newborn in his dream, this is a sign of a new beginning and a shift in the dreamer’s life for the better. And if the visionary is a woman, married/married, who has not yet given birth. This vision is an indication of the fulfillment of her imminent wish and that it will come true in the near future, God willing. If the dreamer sees in a dream a child smiling, and is facing a problem that causes him distress and sadness in reality. This is a sign that this problem is about to end. But if the dreamer sees a child crying in a dream, this is a sign that he will fall into some crises and problems in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqIn Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, seeing a child in a dream is a sign of positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life. What if a free girl sees a child in her dream, this is a sign that she will enter into a new love relationship in the near future. If the child If the girl sees in her dream a beautiful male child, this indicates that this girl will marry the young man she loves in reality. And if the dreamer is suffering from problems and crises in reality and sees a child in his dream. This is a sign that these problems will end soon and his social and economic situation will improve in the future. Nearby. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream by Imam Nabulsi. If anyone sees a child in a dream, it is a sign of the rapid achievement of the goals that the dreamer aspires to in his life. And if the dreamer sees the baby walking in a dream, this is a sign of his imminent marriage if he is single. If the dreamer is married, then The vision is an indication of his success in his work or the achievement of a major business deal. If the dreamer is facing a problem in reality, then seeing a child walking in his dream means that this problem is about to end. If the dreamer is burdened with financial debt in reality. And seeing a child walking in the dream, This is a strong indication that wealth and abundant money are on their way to the dreamer. Seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Shaheen. If an unmarried girl sees a child in a dream, this is a sign that her engagement will come true soon. If the girl gets engaged, the vision indicates that her marriage is approaching without problems. And complications, God willing. If this single girl is actually suffering from psychological problems. Seeing a child in a dream portends the end of these problems and psychological discomfort, God willing. But if an unmarried girl sees a child crying during her sleep, this indicates the cancellation of her engagement or separation from her lover in reality. Seeing a child in a dream for a married woman, according to Ibn Shaheen. If a married woman sees a child in her dream, this indicates the beginning of a new stage in her life, whether it is moving to a new home or starting a new job. What if this woman has not given birth yet? And seeing the child in a dream is a sign of... She will become pregnant soon in reality. If a married woman sees a child crying in her dream, this is an indication that in reality she is suffering from some psychological problems. It may be an indication that there are actually some problems between her and her husband, but these are problems that can

title: Interpretation of a dream about a towel and a towel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a towel in a dream for a single woman, or a pregnant woman, or a married woman, or a divorced woman, or a man, or a bath towel, or white towels, or a women’s menstrual towel, or a bathrobe. The towel in a dream is one of the very strange dreams that we dream about in our dreams, Since a towel in a dream has many connotations, we will learn about it through our topic today, according to the shape, size, and color of the towel and according to the opinion, whether she is a wife, a pregnant woman, or an unmarried girl. We will discuss all of this in detail in our topic today, the interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream, which is what Imam Ibn Sirin explained. In the interpretations. Interpretation of a towel in a dream: Seeing a towel in a dream is interpreted as a servant of women, and drying with it is not praiseworthy, and perhaps the towel indicates a benefit or assistance from a woman in what he desires. As for the mask, it indicates a benefit from a noble person, so whoever sees that he has tightened his waist with it, then... It is interpreted as strength and settling matters, and perhaps that was He has power on the part of children and relatives. Seeing a gallows in a dream portends great sadness over your failure to keep the person you love. If you climb to the gallows, misunderstandings will arise between you and your friends, who will accuse you of some actions that you did not do. If you descend from the gallows, you will be accused Make a mistake and be punished for it. If you dream that you see a friend on a running platform, this portends pressing and disappointing events that need to be resolved or a major disaster that will befall you. But if you dream that you are under a gallows, this means that you will suffer from the deception of fake friends. If a girl dreams that she sees her lover executed in this way , it means that she will marry a cunning and malicious man. If you rescue someone from the gallows, this portends desired pleasures. If you dream that you hang an enemy, this means victory in all areas. Seeing a towel or towel in a dream and the dream can be interpreted for good or bad, depending on the nature of the dream And the dreamer’s circumstances. It is said: If he sees in a dream a towel or a towel, this may indicate the presence of a servant. Some of them said: It may be a sign of Hajj and ihram. Ibn Shaheen said: If a person dreams in a dream that he sees a towel, this may indicate the presence of a servant. And Sheikh Ibn Shirin said: Whoever sees a towel in his dream or sleep, it is likely that this is a sign of comfort, comfort, and good circumstances. And whoever sees it made of cotton and covered with it, this indicates his comfort in life, and the soundness of his religion, especially if the towel was recently purchased and is spacious. If the matter is On the contrary, the opposite is true. Some scholars and translators said: Whoever sees a towel in his dream, it is possible that this vision is the clothing of the righteous. And if a person sees in a dream that he is covered with a towel and covered with it, then this vision may indicate concealment and the justice of his circumstances, but if the dreamer is disobedient to God Almighty, This may be a sign that they will return to the path of God Almighty and repent. Interpretation of dreams about the towel in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. As for the towel, it is the man’s servant. The aforementioned interpretations cannot be confirmed.
